jobDescription: Job Description IBM Analytics, a division of IBMs Hybrid Cloud business unit, is hiring a Software Developer Intern for our San Jose, CA location for Summer/Fall 2018. The intern will have the opportunity to work with IBM's leading edge Big Data product "Big SQL" with our Big SQL team. Responsibilities for this role will include: Design and develop new features in Big SQL improving the performance, security, and scalabilityFocus will be on the authentication, authorization, impersonation, and access control capabilities of Big SQLWork with containerization technology such as DockerOther responsibilities include creating technical specifications, unit test plan/cases and documentation/blogs The ideal candidate will be passionate about Big Data, be collaborative, have a good work ethic, and eager to learn new technologies.  Required Technical and Professional Expertise Experience with Java, Python, SQL, LinuxCurrently enrolled in a graduate degree program Preferred Tech and Prof Experience  None  EO Statement  IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.
